name: Linguine With Colatura
keywords: garlic, lemon juice, linguine, main course, spring
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice, more to taste
1 tablespoon packed grated lemon zest (from 1 1/2 lemons)
1/2 teaspoon crushed red chili pepper flakes, more to taste
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in salted boiling water according to package directions until al dente. In a large bowl, combine colatura, lemon juice, zest, garlic, chili pepper and black pepper.
Drain pasta, and add it to bowl, tossing well. Drizzle in olive oil and parsley, toss to combine, and taste. Add salt if desired. Serve hot or at room temperature.
